title: install fftw@2.1.5 error
body:
### Expected Result

I am trying to install fftw version 2.1.5. I have already installed ver. 3.3.6 and 3.3.7.

### Actual Result

$ spack install fftw@2.1.5 %intel+mpi ^intel-mpi
==> intel-mpi@2017.4 : has external module in intel/impi/2017.4/intel
==> intel-mpi@2017.4 : is actually installed in /usr/local/Cluster-Apps/intel/2017.4/compilers_and_libraries_2017.4.196/linux/mpi/intel64
==> intel-mpi@2017.4 : already registered in DB
==> Installing fftw
==> Using cached archive: /usr/local/software/spack/develop-290617/spack/var/spack/cache/fftw/fftw-2.1.5.tar.gz
==> Staging archive: /usr/local/software/spack/develop-290617/spack/var/spack/stage/fftw-2.1.5-kgx6ywmjvo7esqxqcakmbxruczljsopy/fftw-2.1.5.tar.gz
==> Created stage in /usr/local/software/spack/develop-290617/spack/var/spack/stage/fftw-2.1.5-kgx6ywmjvo7esqxqcakmbxruczljsopy
==> Ran patch() for fftw
==> Building fftw [AutotoolsPackage]
==> Executing phase : 'autoreconf'
==> Executing phase : 'configure'
==> Executing phase : 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j32'
/usr/local/software/spack/develop-290617/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/fftw/package.py:137, in build:
     134      def build(self, spec, prefix):
     135          if '+double' in spec:
     136              with working_dir('double'):
  >> 137                  make()
     138          if '+float' in spec:
     139              with working_dir('float'):
     140                  make()
     141          if '+long_double' in spec:
     142              with working_dir('long-double'):
     143                  make()
     144          if '+quad' in spec:
     145              with working_dir('quad'):
     146                  make()

See build log for details:
  /tmp/wrk21/spack-stage/spack-stage-8ZXjll/fftw-2.1.5/spack-build.out

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ $ spack install fftw@2.1.5 %intel+mpi ^intel-mpi
...
```

### Information on your system

 1. Scientific Linux release 7.3 (Nitrogen)
Linux login-e-12 3.10.0-514.32.3.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Thu Sep 21 04:23:20 EDT 2017 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
 2. no custom configuration

[spack-build.out.gz](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/1551314/spack-build.out.gz)
